type.label: Delivery Size Tile
type.description: Visualizes the size of recent deliveries, with respect to tracked items and associated releases

property.name: deliveryScope
property.description: Include deliveries that are progress, completed, or all (both).

property.name: maxDeliveriesCount
property.label: Max Count
property.description: How many of the latest deliveries to show in the dashboard tile.

property.name: deliveryOrderMode
property.label: Latest
property.description: Which datetime should be used when gathering the latest deliveries.

type.label: Task Metrics Tile
type.description: Visualizes task executions and statuses as a time series and pie chart snapshot combination

property.name: fromDateTime
property.label: From Datetime
property.description: Filter to only include tasks executed after this datetime

property.name: toDateTime
property.label: To Datetime
property.description: Filter to only include tasks executed before this datetime

property.name: dateAggregation
property.description: A time period for aggregation. This value determines how granular the date axis is.

property.name: releaseTags
property.label: Release Tags
property.description: Only include releases which have one of these tags

property.name: taskTags
property.label: Task Tags
property.description: Only include release tasks which have one of these tags
